attributes.action: Listen to and act on the behalf of the people that elected the Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think it is about time the Government (national & local) actually listen to the voters and act upon their behalf.
It is disgusting they make all these promises so they get elected and then changed their views and completely dismiss why they were elected in the first place.
I ask Tony Blair to listen to what the people want.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
